name: [SGJ-2018] Sleep Well
description:
Info

Created during the Summer SemesterGameJam 2018. The theme was 'Nightmare'.

Make sure the kids sleep well. Prevent them from waking up due to nightmares.

Use WASD to walk, SPACE to interact with objects. The monster can only be chased away with the broom!

Team

Art:

  • Tanja @xXBloodyOrange

Programming:
